extension.summary: livestreamspro- shamelessly forked from livestreams but added many thinks
extension.description: In addition to what livestreams allowed you to do, you can now, 1. call regex in regex, 2. multiple regex in page, regex in session, also htmlunescape responses 3. create session from one regex and pass onto next in line 4. save sessions to a file and open again later 5. write python code in .py file, put in the profile directory and then call from your regex. 6. use epoctime, guid and unpack as functions already defined. 7. Use it to post values to the pages to get the proper responses 8. support many headers, like origin, X-Requested-With 9. you can now append cookies in response and then read in regex using includeheaders 10. You can now link to another web url via your xml using externallink 11. support for google captcha, now you can show and then post the text
[I]There can only be one.[/I][CR][CR]Unofficial Kodi Addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: @realvito[CR]Musik aus verschiedenen Quellen z.B. Billboard, iTunes, Spotify etc. auswählen und über Youtube abspielen.[CR][CR]Für mehr Informationen zu allen Neuerungen siehe - CHANGELOG.[CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT

@realvito[CR]Choose Music from different sources e.g. Billboard, iTunes, Spotify etc. and play it via Youtube.[CR][CR]For more information about all new features see - CHANGELOG.[CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Anbietern des Inhalts.
The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content providers.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: [B][COLOR orangered]Version 2.0.9 (25.02.2018)[/COLOR][/B] by realvito[CR] - fixed: Beatport - text errors in genres and Video-Images are not displayed - removed: Beatport - subgenres, since no more available - fixed: Billboard-Archive because of webpage changes - added: German-DJ-Playlist (on special request !) - fixed: Hypem - "Popular: Last Week" and "Time-Machine" listing (html > json) - added: "https://spotifycharts.com" under the rubric "SPOTIFY - International" with *VIRAL top 50* and *TOP Streams* of many countries - changed: new Addon-fanart.jpg

extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: Kodi v18: Fix skin compatability issues Kodi v18: Fix incompatibility with requests module update Kodi v18: Fix issue with playback not resuming properly when direct playing Kodi v18: Fix issue with progress bar not moving on music player/music playlist screens Fix album display on artist screen Fix bug causing failure to show audio player when clicking the mini player from some screens Show original artist when available (Issue #143) Improve centering over label backgrounds on pre-play screens Fix some spots where tokens could still be logged Play correct track when playing a multi-disc album (Issue #148) Improve headers for better identification in 'Now Playing' and future server profile Updated German language strings (thanks to coffinbearer) Fix French translations file (thanks to coffinbearer) Fix some Hungarian translations (thanks to vampywiz17) Add Russion translations (thanks to shady2k) Fix autostart to work with profiles (thanks to pannal) Fix focus loss on home screen due to error (Issue #169) Fix "No Servers Found" when preferred server is unavailable (Issue #159) Fix system keyboard not working for search (Kodi 17+)(Issue #165) Fix issue causing hubs to scroll up when settings were opened Fix failure to sign in when signed off externally (Issue #110, #117)

extension.summary: Aeon Nox 5: Redux - Sự trở về
extension.description: Redux: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Redux: Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Redux: Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Redux: Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeon:lta.
Redux : complètement revu pour créer une apparence moderne, en gardant l'impression classique d'Aeon.
Redux : complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Redux: עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Redux: Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Redux: Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Redux: Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Redux: Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
Redux: 고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Redux: pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Redux: Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Redux: Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Redux: Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Redux: Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Redux: Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Redux: Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Redux: полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Redux: Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Redux: Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
Redux: การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Redux: Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
extension.disclaimer: Mouse control is supported, althoug not recommended. It may not work correctly in all cases.
